name: Stickerland
description:
Stickerland is a game where you are one of a drawing of a small boy. 

Controllers:

A - Left

D - Right

SPACE - Jump

SPACE NEXT TO WALL - Wall jump when unlocked it.

SPACE & LEFT SHIFT - Dash when you unlocked it.

Relevance to theme:

The theme was "Rewind". When you playing, you are discovering a story of the notebook and the boy that made it.  The dates are going backward which makes the game relevant to the theme.

Have fun when playing
